text: Credit : Tidal Mysterious Woman Possibly Dropped Off Beyoncé Baby Gifts at Los Angeles Hospital ( UPDATE ) by 0 Shares Advertisement UPDATE ( 6 / 17 / 17 at 5 : 04 p. m. ET ) : The speculation around whether or not Beyoncé has given birth to her twins continues to grow and now it looks like there's even more evidence. A mysterious woman was spotted carrying a bouquet of pink, purple and blue flowers with two giant baby foot - shaped pink and blue balloons at a Los Angeles hospital on Friday, E! News reported. The balloons read, ` ` Baby Girl'' and ` ` Baby Boy.'' Blue and pink balloons for ` ` B & J'' were delivered to a Los Angeles hospital amid Beyonc birth speculation
